name: Vegan Snowball Cookies
description: Vegan Snowball Cookies are festive little holiday cookies that are buttery, full of pecans and rolled in powdered sugar! Made in 1 bowl with 5 ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a large baking sheet with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a large baking sheet with parchment paper.

recipeInstructions.text: With a hand mixer, cream together the vegan butter and 1/2 cup powdered sugar. Beat in vanilla, then add the flour and pecans and beat on low speed until combined.
recipeInstructions.name: With a hand mixer, cream together the vegan butter and 1/2 cup powdered sugar. Beat in vanilla, then add the flour and pecans and beat on low speed until combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Using a tablespoon or small cookie scoop, scoop out the cooke dough and roll into balls. Place the balls on the prepared baking sheet. Bake for 14-16 minutes or until the cookies are set and the bottoms are slightly brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Using a tablespoon or small cookie scoop, scoop out the cooke dough and roll into balls. Place the balls on the prepared baking sheet. Bake for 14-16 minutes or until the cookies are set and the bottoms are slightly brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the cookies cool for 10 minutes. Place the 1 1/2 cups powdered sugar in a bowl. Roll the cookies in the powdered sugar, then place on a cooling rack, or back on the baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the cookies cool for 10 minutes. Place the 1 1/2 cups powdered sugar in a bowl. Roll the cookies in the powdered sugar, then place on a cooling rack, or back on the baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Once completely cooled, roll once more in powdered sugar. Store in a covered container for up to 5 days.
recipeInstructions.name: Once completely cooled, roll once more in powdered sugar. Store in a covered container for up to 5 days.

keywords: vegan mexican wedding cakes, vegan russian tea cakes, vegan snowball cookies
